ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Cluster-Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) Data
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Cluster 3 Unvalidated Prime Parameter FGM data
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains spin resolution unvalidated prime parameter measurements of the magnetic field vector from the fluxgate magnetometer (FGM) instrument on the Cluster 2 Samba spacecraft. Unvalidated FGM data might sometimes contain artefacts such as spikes (duration ~ 1 spin), or short rotations (few spins). Very occasionally the data contain many spikes over several hours. Please contact Elizabeth Lucek (e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk) for more information regarding possible artefacts in specific intervals of data. The unvalidated prime parameter Data Set does not contain the spacecraft position data or additional range and telemetry mode information that the CAA parameter data set does contain.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA, Andre Balogh, Elizabeth E. Lucek

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Cluster II Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) Data

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time in data cell: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000.

Parameter.Name: Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer status at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: DC Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer dc magnetic field vector at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Normalized Magnetic Field Variance Summed
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized magnetic field variance summed, which is equivalent to the sum over the component variances, at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Normalized Variance of the Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Unvalidated Prime Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized variance of the magnetic field magnitude at spin time resolution
